articles.title: An internal document shows the Vietnamese military preparing for a possible American war - AP News
articles.description: An internal document reveals Vietnam's military is preparing for a possible American war of aggression, viewing the U.S. as a "belligerent" power. The document, reported Tuesday, highlights Vietnam's fear of a U.S.-backed uprising similar to past "color revol…
articles.content: HANOI, Vietnam (AP) A year after Vietnam elevated its relations with Washington to the highest diplomatic level, an internal document shows its military was taking steps to prepare for a possible Ame… [+8056 chars]

articles.title: Cardiologist Dr. Steven Kelley shares tips on maintaining a healthy heart - WBRZ
articles.description: BATON ROUGE — In celebration of American Heart Health Month, Cardiologist Dr. Steven Kelley from Baton Rouge Cardiology Center joined WBRZ to share tips on maintaining a healthy heart.
